game.name: Eternal Hunt
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Eternal Hunt is a pixel art roguelite action game where you battle waves of enemies. Fight on random maps and upgrade your character with powerful weapons and outfits!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Eternal Hunt is a pixel art roguelite action game where you battle waves of enemies. Fight on random maps and upgrade your character with powerful weapons and outfits!
